text: @markknoller @realDonaldTrump Thanks to the suggestion of Nancy Pelosi and Chuck Schumer.  Trump would never have thought of this himself. Indeed, he denies the ungodly number of American lives lost to the coronavirus which he allowed to spin out of control. He went golfing.
